## SendableBitcoinsMoneyp.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Vault by depositing more collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: BitcoinsTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<VaultAdjustmentDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of collateral to add to the Vault's existing collateral. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentbitcoinsmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

